data.name: Forest Harvester Simulator
data.detailed_description:
When trees are felled, the chips will fly — that is definitely about Forest Harvester Simulator game. Here you are a sawmill owner in pursuit of your logging business expansion. Modern woodworking machinery is at your disposal. Manage them wisely to improve the capacity and involve more workers. Remember that only thriving business is attractive.



Join the massive wood production mission and start the pit-sawing right now! Explore the whole forest in search of most suitable tree species. Choose only the best timber. Cut the wood with the help of logging machine and produce wood products for sale.

Use claw to grab tree trunks and bend them with the help of the saw. Do as many wood products as possible. But be extremely accurate, using claw and saw. Don't spoil the timber.

Expand and improve your base: add more garages so you could work not just alone, but with companions, so you would gain even more timber. Build woodworking facilities to produce construction materials and furniture from the raw wood and sell it for the higher profits!

Try Forest Harvester Simulator and you’ll get:


  • Opportunity to control a mighty logging machine;
  • Realistic and detailed logging process;▪ Wide forest area for pit-sawing activities;
  • Wonderful nature and landscapes to admire;
  • An industrial base that can be upgraded to maximize your profit.



Work hard, expand your sawmill and become a really prosperous businessman of the wood industry!

data.short_description: Great pit-saw mission starts on one of the most wooded areas. Control a modern forest harvester and produce as many timber as possible. Also, you can build an industrial base and process the raw wood into more valuable products!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
